fields.description: Required to specify MSI, if using Workspace resource id for databricks REST API. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Authentication

fields.description: <REGION>.azuredatabricks.net, domain name of your Databricks deployment. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: Domain

fields.description: The encrypted credential used for authentication. Credentials are encrypted using the integration runtime credential manager. Type: string.
fields.name: EncryptedCredential

fields.description: The id of an existing interactive cluster that will be used for all runs of this activity. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: ExistingClusterId

fields.description: The id of an existing instance pool that will be used for all runs of this activity. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: InstancePoolId

fields.description: Additional tags for cluster resources. This property is ignored in instance pool configurations.
fields.name: NewClusterCustomTags

fields.description: The driver node type for the new job cluster. This property is ignored in instance pool configurations. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: NewClusterDriverNodeType

fields.description: Enable the elastic disk on the new cluster. This property is now ignored, and takes the default elastic disk behavior in Databricks (elastic disks are always enabled). Type: boolean (or Expression with resultType boolean).
fields.name: NewClusterEnableElasticDisk

fields.description: User-defined initialization scripts for the new cluster. Type: array of strings (or Expression with resultType array of strings).
fields.name: NewClusterInitScripts

fields.description: Specify a location to deliver Spark driver, worker, and event logs. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: NewClusterLogDestination

fields.description: The node type of the new job cluster. This property is required if newClusterVersion is specified and instancePoolId is not specified. If instancePoolId is specified, this property is ignored. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: NewClusterNodeType

fields.description: If not using an existing interactive cluster, this specifies the number of worker nodes to use for the new job cluster or instance pool. For new job clusters, this a string-formatted Int32, like '1' means numOfWorker is 1 or '1:10' means auto-scale from 1 (min) to 10 (max). For instance pools, this is a string-formatted Int32, and can only specify a fixed number of worker nodes, such as '2'. Required if newClusterVersion is specified. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: NewClusterNumOfWorker

fields.description: A set of optional, user-specified Spark configuration key-value pairs.
fields.name: NewClusterSparkConf

fields.description: A set of optional, user-specified Spark environment variables key-value pairs.
fields.name: NewClusterSparkEnvVars

fields.description: If not using an existing interactive cluster, this specifies the Spark version of a new job cluster or instance pool nodes created for each run of this activity. Required if instancePoolId is specified. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: NewClusterVersion

fields.description: The policy id for limiting the ability to configure clusters based on a user defined set of rules. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: PolicyId

fields.description: Workspace resource id for databricks REST API. Type: string (or Expression with resultType string).
fields.name: WorkspaceResourceId
